datasets.description: Women's matches (WSL, NWSL, WWC, Euros) from StatsBomb Open Data
Match event summaries (passes, shots, tackles per match)

resources.name: Our scraper: World Aquatics Diving
resources.description: Scrapes dive-by-dive results with individual J1-J7 judge scores via the World Aquatics (formerly FINA) REST API. Covers Grand Prix, World Cups, World Championships, Olympics, Junior Championships (2017-2025). Outputs athlete results + individual dive scores to CSV.

on_platform.description: 82,074 dive scores with individual judge marks from 112 competitions and 2,794 athletes in our database.

resources.name: Our scraper: World Athletics
resources.description: Uses World Athletics API endpoints for records and all-time top lists. Women's and men's events. Ethical: public API, respects rate limits.

resources.name: Our scraper: World Rugby
resources.description: Scrapes World Rugby match results via public Pulse Live API. All international and club rugby: Men's 15s, Women's 15s, 7s, U20 from 2015-present. Scores, venues, attendance, competitions. Based on octonion/rugby API patterns. Ethical: public API, no auth needed.

resources.name: Our scraper: World Triathlon (ITU)
resources.description: Scrapes ITU/World Triathlon race results via official API. Auto-discovers WTCS, World Cup, and Olympic events with swim/bike/run splits.

resources.name: Our scraper: WTA/ATP Tennis
resources.description: Downloads Jeff Sackmann's WTA and ATP match data from GitHub. Consolidated CSVs with gender tagging.

resources.name: pbpstats
resources.description: Python package to scrape and parse NBA, WNBA, and G-League play-by-play data. Possession-level analysis with shot clock data. Verified: loads boxscores and play-by-play from stats.nba.com.

on_platform.description: pip install pbpstats — tested: NBA 2024-25 game data loads successfully.

resources.name: penaltyblog
resources.description: Dixon-Coles, Bivariate Poisson, and other models for estimating team abilities and predicting match outcomes.

resources.name: PTO Stats
resources.description: Professional Triathletes Organisation stats: race results, PTO World Rankings, T100 standings. Swim/bike/run splits and PTO points for pro athletes.

on_platform.description: 1,754 pro results from 50 races in our database.

resources.name: pybaseball
resources.description: Python package for Baseball Reference, FanGraphs, and Statcast data including pitch-level tracking.

resources.name: pydatavolley
resources.description: Python package for reading DataVolley files (the standard format for professional volleyball analytics).

resources.name: PySport
resources.description: Directory of 40+ open-source Python projects for sports analytics. Curated ecosystem overview across all sports.

resources.name: python-espncricinfo
resources.description: Python client for ESPNcricinfo: player profiles, match details, and batting/bowling scorecards.

resources.name: rugbypy
resources.description: Python package for rugby data: 8,444 players, 289 teams, 6,171 matches (2022-2026) across 23 competitions including Six Nations, Premiership, Top 14, Japan League One, and Women's Six Nations. Match details, player stats, team lookups.

on_platform.description: pip install rugbypy — tested: 23 competitions, 289 teams, 6,171 matches, 8,444 players all load correctly.

resources.name: RunSignup API
resources.description: JSON API for 28,000+ US running events. Gender, age, splits, pace, chip time. Free API key registration required for results access. The largest US race results platform.

resources.name: ScraperFC
resources.description: Python scraper for FBref, Transfermarkt, Understat, Capology (wages), FotMob, and SofaScore.

resources.name: SkatingScores.com
resources.description: Community-maintained figure skating results database. Competition results for senior men, women, pairs, and ice dance from ISU championships, Grand Prix, Olympics from 2003-present. Partially behind Patreon paywall for detailed data.

resources.name: Ski Jumping Data Center (GitHub)
resources.description: Comprehensive FIS ski jumping dataset: 288,012 results (154K with 5 style judge scores), 4,596 competitions across 92 venues. Men, Women, Mixed events from Continental Cup to World Cup (2009-2022). Ideal for judging bias analysis.

on_platform.description: 288K results with 5-judge style scores in our database.

resources.name: SkillCorner (Commercial)
resources.description: Broadcast-derived tracking data for 50+ football competitions. Physical and tactical metrics. Academic pricing available.

resources.name: SkillCorner Open Data
resources.description: Broadcast tracking data (x, y positions at 10 Hz) for the Australian A-League 2024/2025. One of the few open tracking datasets available.

resources.name: soccer_xg
resources.description: Train and analyze expected goals (xG) models. By the ML group at KU Leuven. Custom feature engineering support.

resources.name: socceraction
resources.description: SPADL/Atomic-SPADL representations and action valuations (VAEP, xT). Developed at KU Leuven by Tom Decroos and Lotte Bransen.

resources.name: soccerdata
resources.description: Python package to scrape football data from Club Elo, ESPN, FBref, FiveThirtyEight, SoFIFA, Understat, and WhoScored.

resources.name: SpeedSkatingResults.com
resources.description: Comprehensive speed skating results database with JSON API. Season bests, world records, competition results.

on_platform.description: Full performance and participation data in our database.

resources.name: Sporthive / MYLAPS
resources.description: Public race results API (MYLAPS chip timing). Covers 1000+ running and cycling events worldwide: marathons, half marathons, sportives. JSON API with split times, gender, age categories, nationality.

on_platform.description: 35+ running events (Dam tot Dam, Amsterdam/Rotterdam Marathon, Cardiff/Manchester Half, etc.) and 20 cycling sportives in our database.

resources.name: Sportradar
resources.description: Multi-sport data API covering 60+ sports. Live odds, statistics, play-by-play. Powers many betting and media companies.

resources.name: Sports Betting Analytics (octonion/betting)
resources.description: Kelly criterion implementations, horse racing analytics, and betting strategy experiments. Python tools for analyzing odds, calculating optimal bet sizes, and simulating strategies. 42 stars, includes academic papers.

resources.name: SportsDataverse
resources.description: Ecosystem of R and Python packages for sports data: hoopR, wehoop, fastRhockey, cfbfastR, baseballr, and more.

resources.name: sportsipy
resources.description: Python wrapper for Sports Reference sites: MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL, NCAAB, and NCAAF through a unified interface.

resources.name: sportypy
resources.description: Draw regulation-accurate playing surfaces for 7 sports: soccer, basketball (NBA/NCAA/WNBA/FIBA), American football (NFL/NCAA), ice hockey (NHL/IIHF), baseball (MLB), tennis (ATP/WTA/ITF), and curling. Matplotlib-based.

on_platform.description: pip install sportypy — tested: SoccerPitch, NBACourt, NFLField, NHLRink, MLBField, TennisCourt all render correctly.

resources.name: Tennis Abstract / Match Charting Project
resources.description: Player profiles, Elo ratings, and point-by-point match data from the Match Charting Project. By Jeff Sackmann.

resources.name: The Odds API
resources.description: Aggregated odds from 30+ bookmakers for football, basketball, tennis, baseball, and more. 500 free requests/month.

resources.name: Tilastopaja
resources.description: Finnish athletics statistics service. Comprehensive results database with API access. Historical data going back decades.

resources.name: Transfermarkt Datasets (GitHub)
resources.description: Clean, weekly-updated CSV exports of Transfermarkt data: 60K+ matches, 30K+ players, 400K+ market valuations, 1.2M+ appearance records. CC0 licensed. Also on Kaggle (61K downloads).

resources.name: UCSAS Gymnastics Data (gym2024)
resources.description: Comprehensive artistic gymnastics dataset from UCSAS 2024 Data Challenge. 25,483 routines across 40+ competitions (2017-2023): D-score, E-score, penalties per apparatus. 200+ original FIG PDFs included. Men's and women's events.

on_platform.description: Full dataset (25K+ routines) available on our platform.

resources.name: UFC Betting Odds (Daily Updated)
resources.description: Daily-updated UFC/MMA betting odds dataset. Opening and closing lines, fighter stats. Useful for combat sports analytics and prediction models.

resources.name: Ultra-Marathon Dataset (Kaggle)
resources.description: 7M+ ultra-marathon race records from 1798-2022. The largest publicly available endurance running dataset.

resources.name: Understat
resources.description: Expected goals (xG) data for the Big 5 European leagues and Russian Premier League. Shot-level xG data since 2014/15.

resources.name: understatapi
resources.description: Python client for Understat.com xG data. League team stats, player shot data (1,462 Messi shots with xG/position), and match-level shot maps. Covers Big 5 + Russian Premier League since 2014/15.

on_platform.description: pip install understatapi — tested: EPL 2024 (20 teams), player xG shots, match shot maps all load correctly.

resources.name: wehoop
resources.description: R package for WNBA and women's college basketball data. Mirrors hoopR for women's basketball.

resources.name: World Aquatics Results
resources.description: Official World Aquatics competition results database for swimming, diving, water polo, and artistic swimming.

resources.name: World Athletics
resources.description: Official records, rankings, and results for track & field. GraphQL API available. Men's and women's data.

resources.name: World Rugby Pulse Live API
resources.description: Public API for all World Rugby matches from 1950 to present. Men's 15s, Women's 15s, 7s, U20. Scores, venues, attendance, competitions. No auth required. ~2,000+ matches/year across all formats.

on_platform.description: 14,329 matches (2015-2026) in our database via our Python scraper.

resources.name: World Triathlon API
resources.description: Official World Triathlon (ITU) API with events, results, athletes, rankings, and live timing. Free API key registration. Covers all WTCS, World Cup, and Olympic events.

on_platform.description: 24,786 results from 130 events (WTCS, Continental Cups, Age Groups, Para) in our database.

datasets.description: World Triathlon race results (WTCS, Continental Cups, Age Groups, Para) via API

resources.name: worldfootballR
resources.description: R package for extracting football data from FBref, Transfermarkt, Understat, and Fotmob. CRAN-installable.

resources.name: Wyscout (Commercial)
resources.description: Professional video and data platform for football scouting. Event data for 200+ competitions. Academic access available.

resources.name: Wyscout Match Event Dataset
resources.description: World Cup 2018, Euro 2016, and top-5 league match event data. Academic-licensed dataset by Pappalardo et al. with accompanying research paper.

resources.name: Yale Diving 2000 (Sydney Olympics)
resources.description: Academic dataset from Emerson et al. (Yale) on nationalistic bias in Olympic diving. 10,787 individual judge scores from the 2000 Sydney Olympics across all diving events. Includes judge nationality, diver nationality, difficulty, and scores.

on_platform.description: Full dataset (10,787 judge scores) available on our platform.

datasets.description: Yale diving research dataset: 10,787 individual judge scores from Sydney 2000 Olympics
